system.notes:
Possesses all Power Armour Subsystems (See Armour Upgrades). +20 to Strength Characteristic. 20 minutes to don/doff unaided, 5 mins aided, Half action to remove helmet.
Increases Size to Hulking. Poor Manual Dexterity causes -10 to use equipment not designed for Space Marines, non-Astartes Ranged weapons need modification to work at all.
Roll once for Power Armour History.
